rules: Rule1: Either team Alpha wins game1 or team Beta wins game1.
Rule2: The tournament is interrupted, or team Alpha qualifies for the finals, or if team Alpha wins game1 then they become the champion of the tournament.
Rule3: Whenever there is a hardware failure with a computer, the tournament is not interrupted.
Rule4: There is a hardware failure with a computer, or there is a hardware failure with a console.
Rule5: Provided that there is a hardware failure with a peripheral, the tournament is not interrupted.
Rule6: Under the condition that viewers are compensated, tickets are refunded.
Rule7: If the event is delayed, then there is a technical glitch with the server.
Rule8: Whenever the event is postponed, it is delayed.
Rule9: Provided that team Beta wins game1, they become the champion of the tournament.
Rule10: If day2 is scheduled, then under the condition that there is a technical glitch with the broadcast, the event is postponed.
Rule11: Either day1 is completed or the event is not canceled.
Rule12: Under the condition that brand X sponsors the event, the product is featured.
Rule13: Either brand X sponsors the event or brand Y sponsors the event.
Rule14: Provided that brand Y sponsors the event, if there is a technical glitch with the broadcast, then there is a technical glitch with the server.
Rule15: Whenever the product is advertised, under the condition that there is a technical glitch with the broadcast, there is a technical glitch with the server.
Rule16: Provided that the event is promoted, whenever the product is featured, it is advertised.
Rule17: Either team Gamma is registered or team Delta is registered.

Rule18: Provided that team Delta is registered, if team Beta qualifies for the finals, then either team Alpha qualifies for the finals or if team Alpha wins game1 then they become the champion of the tournament.
Rule19: Under the condition that rules are violated, a decision is protested.
Rule20: Provided that rules are violated, a player is not penalized.

Rule21: Either merchandise is available, or if it is not the case that the livestream being available implies that if team Beta qualifies for the finals then either team Alpha qualifies for the finals or if team Alpha wins game1 then they become the champion of the tournament, then there is a technical glitch with the server.
Rule22: Provided that merchandise is restocked, it is reordered.
Rule23: Either food is available, or if team Beta qualifies for the finals then either team Alpha qualifies for the finals or if team Alpha wins game1 then they become the champion of the tournament.
Rule24: Whenever catering is delivered, food is not available.
Rule25: Either catering is delivered or food is ordered.
Rule26: Under the condition that food is ordered, it is cooked.
Rule27: If food is prepared, then it is not available.
Rule28: Provided that food is cooked, it is prepared.
Rule29: Either the livestream is available or the recording is available.

Rule30: Provided that the recording is available, if team Beta qualifies for the finals then either team Alpha qualifies for the finals or if team Alpha wins game1 then they become the champion of the tournament.
Rule31: Provided that it is not the case that a hardware failure with a console implies a hardware failure with a peripheral, the equipment is repaired.
Rule32: Under the condition that it is not the case that a hardware failure with a console implies a hardware failure with a peripheral, the equipment is not replaced.
Rule33: Provided that it is not the case that the equipment being repaired implies it is replaced, viewers are compensated.
Rule34: Under the condition that it is not the case that a decision being protested implies a player is penalized, a ruling is appealed.
Rule35: Provided that it is not the case that merchandise being reordered implies that if it is sold out then it is not available, shipping is delayed.
Rule36: Whenever it is not the case that merchandise being reordered implies that if it is sold out then it is not available, shipping is not delayed.

Rule37: Provided that it is not the case that the livestream being available implies that if team Beta qualifies for the finals then either team Alpha qualifies for the finals or if team Alpha wins game1 then they become the champion of the tournament, there is a technical glitch with the broadcast.

Rule38: Whenever it is not the case that the livestream being available implies that if team Beta qualifies for the finals then either team Alpha qualifies for the finals or if team Alpha wins game1 then they become the champion of the tournament, there is no technical glitch with the server.
Rule39: Under the condition that it is not the case that a technical glitch with the broadcast implies a technical glitch with the server, the issue is resolved.

Rule40: Provided that it is not the case that the negation of team Gamma being registered implies that if team Beta qualifies for the finals then either team Alpha qualifies for the finals or if team Alpha wins game1 then they become the champion of the tournament implies a team is disqualified, rules are violated.
Rule41: If day2 is not scheduled, then the event is canceled.
facts: Fact4: Team Beta qualifies for the finals.
Fact7: Team Alpha does not qualify for the finals.
Fact8: A team is not disqualified.
Fact9: A ruling is not appealed.
Fact10: The issue is not resolved.

question: A champion is crowned for the tournament.
